items.headline: Setting up and executing a print job,basic design theory,print projects
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, Students will have gained a basic but wide ‘working knowledge’ of Paintshop Pro. Knowledge that will ‘open the door’, to bringing many aspects of design and print within their own power, reducing their need to rely on corporate institutions and other expensive outsourcing.
Aspects learned in this course are inclusive of, but not limited to:
•	Gaining fundamental working knowledge of Paint Shop Pro

items.title: Learn mold design in NX11.0 from scratch
items.headline: A detailed guide towards Mold Design from the concept to the documentation
objectives_summary: Students will be able to add mold components such as core, cavity, sprue, gate, runner, ejection rods, cooling channels, and various standard parts in NX.
Using the authentic mold wizard library, besides adding standard mold components, students will be able to customize them to meet the dimensional requirements.
Making the students capable of performing mold flow analysis using the dedicated easy fill advanced plugin is the highlight of the course.
